name: Rate Limit Override
effect: This weapon gains a Heat 1 (Self) tag, or increases it by 1 if it already has one. Each attack with it gains +2 Reliable.
description: A general purpose modification designed to generally improve performance of most munitions-firing weapons, often by increasing the volume of fire. The additional components require increased power draw, which might introduce problems for weaker reactors.

name: Zip Ammo
effect: The weapon gains AP. It cannot be fired at any target within Range 3.
description: Weaponized blink tech is a terrifying thing, a fact clearly evidenced by the Voladores’ reticence to trade their knowledge on the subject to the Armory. IPS-N is possibly no better. By attaching this module to a weapon, and pairing it with appropriate ordnance, projectile airtime is minimized with a short-range blink-hop, raising penetration and accuracy, though introducing a minimum range.
